statements: SELECT * FROM CampaignData WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, total_spend FROM CampaignData WHERE total_clicks > 1000;
SELECT end_date, total_impressions FROM CampaignData WHERE total_spend < 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_clicks FROM CampaignData WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, total_spend, total_impressions FROM CampaignData WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM CampaignData WHERE total_spend > 5000 ORDER BY total_spend DESC, total_impressions ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks FROM CampaignData WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, total_spend, total_impressions FROM CampaignData WHERE total_clicks > 1000 ORDER BY end_date DESC, total_spend ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_spend / total_impressions AS cost_per_impression FROM CampaignData WHERE total_impressions > 500 ORDER BY cost_per_impression ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_clicks FROM CampaignData WHERE total_spend BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC, total_clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM past_promotional_campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, impact_on_demand FROM past_promotional_campaign WHERE promotion_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT prediction_id, predicted_demand FROM future_demand_prediction WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT campaign_name, promotion_start_date, promotion_end_date FROM past_promotional_campaign ORDER BY promotion_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM past_promotional_campaign JOIN future_demand_prediction ON past_promotional_campaign.campaign_id = future_demand_prediction.campaign_id WHERE predicted_demand > 1000;
SELECT * FROM past_promotional_campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, impact_on_demand FROM past_promotional_campaign ORDER BY impact_on_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM future_demand_prediction WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, promotion_start_date, promotion_end_date FROM past_promotional_campaign WHERE promotion_end_date < CURRENT_DATE();

SELECT campaign_name, promotion_start_date, promotion_end_date, predicted_demand FROM past_promotional_campaign JOIN future_demand_prediction ON past_promotional_campaign.campaign_id = future_demand_prediction.campaign_id ORDER BY predicted_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotional_campaign_data;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotional_campaign_data ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, budget, target_audience FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, estimated_impact FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE estimated_impact > 50 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date, budget, target_audience FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE estimated_impact > 1000 AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date, target_audience FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE budget BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 AND estimated_impact > 500 ORDER BY target_audience;
SELECT analysis_id, demand_forecast, demand_actual, demand_discrepancy FROM demand_analysis WHERE demand_discrepancy > 50;

SELECT p.prediction_id, p.prediction_date, da.analysis_date, da.demand_forecast FROM future_demand_prediction p JOIN demand_analysis da ON p.analysis_id = da.analysis_id WHERE p.prediction_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM promotional_campaign_data ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE target_audience = 'Adults';
SELECT * FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE campaign_id = 1001;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-02-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE target_audience IN ('Male', 'Female') AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date, budget, target_audience FROM promotional_campaign_data WHERE end_date > '2022-08-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC, campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM past_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM past_campaigns WHERE total_spent > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impact_on_demand, prediction FROM campaign_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM past_campaigns ORDER BY total_sales DESC, start_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE birth_date < '1990-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impact_on_demand, analysis_date FROM campaign_analysis WHERE prediction > 500 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE product_id = 1);
